body: A reference from the implementation from Apache [here](https://reviews.apache.org/r/46340/diff/2#index_header). They just defined a Windows version of `os.waitpid`, supporting the option arg `WNOHANG`. But i don't think there is sth like that in Windows. A better way to implement it may be using threads or processes like what i stated below.
